headline.main: STEINHARDT GUIDES OUR AID IN MOSCOW; Ambassador Will Remain in Soviet Capital as Director of United States Supplies POLES WILL ENTER FRAY 32,000 Going Into Action, Hull Informed -- Greek Confers With the President

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 14 -- Secretary of State Cordell Hull announced today that Laurence A. Steinhardt, United States Ambassador to Soviet Russia, had canceled for the time being his plans to return to the United States for consultations and would remain in Moscow.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: GOVERNMENTS IN EXILE AND NATIONAL COMMITTEES
